faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: The students will read basic texts on a number of specifc topics. The texts will be discussed with the teacher. The  students will find papers reporting recent developments pertinent to the topic of the day, and will present them publicly.
description.et: Üliõpilased loevad õpikutekste mitmete spetsiifiliste küsimuste kohta ning arutavad neid õppejõuga seminari vormis. Üliõpilased leiavad teadusartikleid, mis raporteerivad uudseid teadussaavutusi fookuses oleval teemal ja refereerivad  neid ettekande vormis.

objectives.en: To introduce basic principles of insect ecoogy and recent developments in the field
objectives.et: Tutvustada putukate ökoloogia põhiseisukohti ja uusi arenguid valdkonnas.

learning_outcomes.en: The student will 1) understand special features of insects in the context of ecological science; 2) know the basic principles of the field; 2) be able to follow recent developments in the field and to  place them into the framework of basic principles.
learning_outcomes.et: Aine läbinu 1) mõistab putukate eripära ökoloogiateaduse kontekstis, 2) orienteerub teadusharu põhiseisukohtades, 3) suudab jälgida uusi arenguid ning suhestada neid teadusharu põhiseiskohtadega.

independent_work.et: to be decided on a rolling basis

grade_preconditions.et: participated in at least 70% of the seminars, deadlines will be agreed about on a rolling basis

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

resources.mandatory_materials: will be distributed during the course
resources.recommended_materials: will be distributed during the course

description.et: to be decided on a rolling basis

audience.et: Meant for foreign exchange students and those specialising in insect ecology.
